author: Dale Carnegie
quote: Inaction breeds doubt and fear. Action breeds confidence and courage. If you want to conquer fear, do not sit home and think about it. Go out and get busy.

author: Thomas Jefferson
quote: Do you want to know who you are? Don't ask. Act! Action will delineate and define you.

author: Pablo Picasso
quote: Action is the foundational key to all success.

author: Confucius
quote: When it is obvious that the goals cannot be reached, don't adjust the goals, adjust the action steps.

author: W. Clement Stone
quote: Thinking will not overcome fear but action will.

author: John F. Kennedy
quote: There are risks and costs to action. But they are far less than the long range risks of comfortable inaction.

author: Martin Luther King, Jr.
quote: If you can’t fly, then run, if you can’t run, then walk, if you can’t walk, then crawl, but whatever you do, you have to keep moving forward.

author: Gail Devers
quote: Every accomplishment starts with a decision to try.

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
quote: Once you make a decision, the universe conspires to make it happen.

author: Ernest Hemingway
quote: Now is no time to think of what you do not have. Think of what you can do with what there is.

author: Farrah Gray
quote: Build your own dreams, or someone else will hire you to build theirs.

author: Joan of Arc
quote: I am not afraid… I was born to do this.

author: Conrad Hilton
quote: Success seems to be connected to action. Successful people keep moving. They make mistakes, but they don’t quit.

author: Tony Robbins
quote: The path to success is to take massive, determined action.

author: Joan Baez
quote: Action is the antidote to despair.

author: Norman Vincent Peale
quote: Action is a great restorer and builder of confidence. Inaction is not only the result, but the cause of fear.

author: Mahatma Gandhi
quote: The future depends on what you do today.

author: Arthur Ashe
quote: To achieve greatness, start where you are, use what you have, and do what you can.

author: Benjamin Disraeli
quote: Action may not always bring happiness; but there is no happiness without action.

author: Mark Twain
quote: Action speaks louder than words but not nearly as often.

author: Serena Williams
quote: The success of every woman should be the inspiration to another. We should raise each other up.

author: Maya Angelou
quote: Nothing can dim the light which shines from within.

author: Eleanor Roosevelt
quote: No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.

author: Amelia Earhart
quote: The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity.

author: Ruth Bader Ginsburg
quote: Fight for the things that you care about, but do it in a way that will lead others to join you.

author: Michelle Obama
quote: There is no limit to what we, as women, can accomplish.

author: Oprah Winfrey
quote: Think like a queen. A queen is not afraid to fail. Failure is another stepping stone to greatness.

author: Helen Keller
quote: Never let a little adverse weather depress you. Believe in yourself and your abilities because there is always sunshine on the other side.

author: Audrey Hepburn
quote: There is always light. If only we’re brave enough to see it. If only we’re brave enough to be it.

author: Jane Goodall
quote: What you do makes a difference, and you have to decide what kind of difference you want to make.

author: Amanda Gorman
quote: There is always light. If only we’re brave enough to see it. If only we’re brave enough to be it.

author: Sheryl Sandberg
quote: We need women at all levels… to change the dynamic… to make sure women’s voices are heard.

author: Toni Morrison
quote: My world did not shrink because I was a black female writer. It just got bigger.

author: Dolly Parton
quote: If you don’t like the road you’re walking, start paving another one.

author: Coco Chanel
quote: A girl should be two things: Who and what she wants.

author: Maya Angelou
quote: I’ve come to believe that each of us has a personal calling that’s as unique as a fingerprint…

author: Frida Kahlo
quote: At the end of the day, we can endure much more than we think we can.

author: Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie
quote: I have chosen to no longer be apologetic for my femaleness and my femininity.

author: Billie Jean King
quote: Champions keep playing until they get it right.

author: Mother Teresa
quote: Do not wait for leaders; do it alone, person to person.

author: Malala Yousafzai
quote: We realize the importance of our voices only when they are silenced.

author: Grace Lee Boggs
quote: Movements are born of critical connections rather than critical mass.

author: Rupi Kaur
quote: What’s the greatest lesson a woman should learn? That… she’s already had everything she needs within herself.

author: Rosa Parks
quote: When life seems hard, the courageous do not lie down and accept defeat…

author: Ellen Johnson Sirleaf
quote: If your dreams do not scare you, they are not big enough.

author: Coretta Scott King
quote: The greatness of a community is most accurately measured by the compassionate actions of its members.

author: Edith Wharton
quote: There are two ways of spreading light: to be the candle or the mirror that reflects it.

author: Ruth Gordon
quote: Courage is like a muscle. We strengthen it by use.

author: Jane Goodall
quote: What you do makes a difference, and you have to decide what kind of difference you want to make.

author: Oprah Winfrey
quote: No matter where you are on your journey, that’s exactly where you need to be. The next road is always ahead.

author: Florence Griffith Joyner
quote: When anyone tells me I can’t do anything … I’m just not listening anymore.

author: Robin Sharma
quote: Dream big, start small, act now.

author: Jack Welch
quote: It is better to act too quickly than it is to wait too long.

author: Mark Victor Hansen
quote: Do not wait until everything is just right… Get started now.

author: Paulo Coelho
quote: One day you will wake up and there won’t be any more time… Do it now.

author: Saint Francis of Assisi
quote: First do what is necessary. Then do what is possible… then do the impossible.

author: Goethe
quote: Whatever you dream you can do, begin it. Boldness has genius, power and magic.

author: Robert T. Kiyosaki
quote: Your future is created by what you do today, not tomorrow.

author: Montaigne
quote: Anything that can be done another day can be done today.

author: Chinese Proverb
quote: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is today.

author: Richard Branson
quote: If somebody offers you an amazing opportunity… say yes. Then learn how to do it later.

author: Lao Tzu
quote: The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.

author: W. Clement Stone
quote: So many fail because they don’t get started.

author: Irish Proverb
quote: You’ll never plow a field by turning it over in your mind.

author: George Chapman
quote: The best way to accomplish something is to just do it… then find the courage afterward.

author: George Eliot
quote: It is never too late to become what we might have been.

author: Benjamin Franklin
quote: Never confuse motion with action.

author: William Butler Yeats
quote: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot; but make it hot by striking.

author: John Wooden
quote: Don’t let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.

author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
quote: Doubt can only be removed by action.

author: Loesje
quote: The longer you wait for the future, the shorter it will be.

author: Marie Forleo
quote: Taking action is the only path to change.

author: Mark Manson
quote: Action isn’t just the effect of motivation; it’s also the cause of it.

author: Marie Ebner‑Eschenbach
quote: There is only one proof of ability—action.

author: Timothy M. Brenner
quote: Action is what makes hope a reality.

author: Bradley Whitford
quote: Infuse your life with action. Make it happen—your own hope, your own future.

author: Dietrich Bonhoeffer
quote: Action springs not from thought, but from a readiness for responsibility.

author: Oscar Wilde
quote: Action is the last resource of those who know not how to dream.

author: John Locke
quote: The actions of men are the best interpreters of their thoughts.

author: Bob Dylan
quote: Act the way you’d like to be and soon you’ll be the way you’d like to act.

author: Lailah Gifty Akita
quote: Action is the seed of thoughts.

author: Dwayne Johnson
quote: Action creates momentum. Momentum creates success.

author: Charlotte Bunch
quote: We do not need all the answers before we act…

author: Napoleon Bonaparte
quote: Take time to deliberate, but when the time for action has arrived, stop thinking and go in.

author: Pedro Calderón de la Barca
quote: A good action is never lost; it is treasure for the doer.

author: Al Batt
quote: It is easy to sit up and take notice. What is difficult is getting up and taking action.

author: Jacob Bronowski
quote: The world can only be grasped by action, not contemplation.

author: Thomas Carlyle
quote: The end of man is action, and not thought.

author: Robert South
quote: Action is the highest perfection of man’s nature.

author: Mary T. Brown
quote: Each individual is responsible for their own actions… every action will produce an equal reaction.

author: Catherine Pulsifer
quote: No action, no change. Limited action, limited change.

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
quote: An action is the perfection and publication of thought.

author: Confucius
quote: The superior man is modest in speech but exceeds in actions.

author: Matthew Quick
quote: Your actions make you a good person, not desire.

author: Henri Bergson
quote: Think like a man of action and act like a man of thought.

author: Patrick Ness
quote: You write your life with actions. What you think is irrelevant.

author: DaShanne Stokes
quote: If your actions don’t live up to your words, you have nothing to say.

author: Anna Shine
quote: Actions speak louder than thoughts—it’s what you do that shows love.

author: Ernest Gaines
quote: Words mean nothing. Action is the only thing.

author: Anderson Silva
quote: Life is about how much you can take and keep fighting… and keep moving forward.

author: James Roosevelt
quote: Believe you can and you’re halfway there.

author: Sam Levenson
quote: Don’t watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.

author: Andre Gide
quote: One doesn’t discover new lands without consenting to lose sight of shore.

author: Tim Ferriss
quote: Tomorrow becomes never. Take the first step now!

author: Ayn Rand
quote: The question isn’t who is going to let me, it’s who is going to stop me.

author: Denis Waitley
quote: Don’t dwell on what went wrong. Focus on what to do next.

author: Walt Disney
quote: We keep moving forward, opening new doors, doing new things… because curiosity keeps leading us down new paths.

author: LL Cool J
quote: Stay focused, go after your dreams and keep moving toward your goals.

author: Jerry Seinfeld
quote: To live is to keep moving.

author: Lonzo Ball
quote: You can’t control everything, but you can control what you do after it.

author: Danica Patrick
quote: Take chances—you’ll never know what you can achieve.

author: Shannon Miller
quote: There will always be a reason you can’t. Your job is to find a reason you can.

author: Misty Copeland
quote: Know that you can start late, look different… and still succeed.

author: Jim Ryun
quote: Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.

author: Henry David Thoreau
quote: An early morning walk is a blessing for the whole day.

author: Rory McIlroy
quote: Going to the gym is great for the mind and the body.

author: John Bingham
quote: If you run, you are a runner. It doesn’t matter how fast or far.

author: Meryl Streep
quote: Don’t waste time thinking about weight. Don’t miss living life.

author: Michael Ali
quote: It isn’t the mountains ahead that wear you out; it’s the pebble in your shoe.

author: Michael Phelps
quote: When tired, think about how great you’ll feel once you reach your goal.

author: Oprah Winfrey
quote: Whatever your goal is, you can get there—as long as you're honest about the work involved.

author: Muhammad Ali
quote: Don’t quit. Suffer now and live the rest of your life as a champion.

author: Simone Biles
quote: I’d rather regret the risks that didn’t work than the chances I didn’t take.

author: George Halas
quote: Nobody who ever gave his best regretted it.

author: Babe Ruth
quote: You just can’t beat the person who never gives up.

author: Stephen Richards
quote: The pain you feel today is the strength you feel tomorrow.

author: Jerry Rice
quote: Today I will do what others won’t, so tomorrow I can accomplish what others can’t.

author: Emma Coburn
quote: Be so strong nothing can disturb your peace of mind. Expect only the best.
